data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 500 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Ancestor's Blessing
data.description: Healing abilities have a 25% chance to also increase your target's AP by 50. This effect will not work on yourself.

data.name: Ancestor's Echo
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to 475 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Increases your Armor by 660.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Blessing of Grungni
data.description: Critical direct heals will Bless your target for 10 seconds, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.

data.name: Blessing of Valaya
data.description: Heals all groupmembers within 100 feet for 679 health.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Cleansing Vitality
data.description: Rune of Cleansing will now heal the defensive target for 399 over 9 seconds if an effect was successfully removed.

data.name: Concussive Runes
data.description: Attacks in the path of Grimnir have a 25% chance to detaunt your target, reducing their damage towards you to 50% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your healing becomes 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Earth's Shielding
data.description: Each attack against an active Rune of Shielding will randomly debuff one of the attacker's stats by 120 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Efficient Runecarving
data.description: While under the effects of your Rune of Breaking; each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Extended Battle
data.description: Increases area of effect of Rune Of Cleaving and Rune Of Battle by 50%.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Grimnir's Fury
data.description: Resurrects all fallen groupmembers within 30 feet, and does not cause Resurrection Sickness. Anyone resurrected by this effect will regain 50% of their hit points.

data.name: Grimnir's Shield
data.description: You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Grungni's Gift
data.description: Heals 295 to defensive target.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Immolating Grasp
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Immolation has a 25% chance to drain 30 Action Points from target and snare them by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Master Rune of Adamant
data.note:
You may only have 1 Master Rune active
Requires 5 points in Path of Grimnir
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Heals Groupmates within 100 feet of the Rune of Adamant for 146 health every 3 seconds while the Master rune is active.

data.name: Master Rune of Fury
data.note:
You may only have 1 Master Rune active
Requires 5 points in Path of Grungni
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Groupmates within the 100 feet of the Rune of Fury have a 20% chance to gain 50 AP whenever they activate an ability.

data.name: Master Rune of Speed
data.note:
You may only have 1 Master Rune active
Requires 5 points in Path of Valaya
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Groupmates within 100 feet of the Rune of Speed have their buildup times reduced by 0.25 seconds.

data.name: Mountain Spirit
data.description: Increase the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by 1320 and resists by 504 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Oath Rune of Iron
data.description:
Increase targeted group member's Initiative and Willpower by 50 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict 488 Elemental damage over 9 seconds.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Power
data.description:
Increases target group member's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by 50 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate to inflict 234 Elemental damage to a target.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Sanctuary
data.description:
Increases targeted group member's Toughness by 80 for 1 hour. The rune holder will then be able to resurrect themselves with 20% health if killed within the next 10 minutes. Doing so will remove the Oath Rune.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Oath Rune of Warding
data.description:
Increases targeted group member's Resists by 157 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict 344 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to all targets within 30 feet.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: On Your Feet!
data.description: Rune of Life, Rune of Sanctuary and Grimnir's Fury will heal the target for 132 health over 5 seconds and will restore 70 Action Points when the target is resurrected.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Potent Runes
data.description: Rune of Striking and Rune of Immolation are now undefendable.

data.name: Protection of the Ancestors
data.description: Increases target group member's Wounds by 100 for 60 seconds. Heals target for value of HP increase.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Regenerative Shielding
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Regeneration has 25% chance to increase target's armor by 1056 for 10 seconds. Additionally, 10% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Battle
data.description: Buffs you or a friendly player with a pulsing area of effect that deals 256 Elemental damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within to 30 feet for 15 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Binding
data.description: Wounds your target for 245 Elemental damage and Staggers the target for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Rune of Breaking
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you gain the Rune of Breaking, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you gain the Rune of Balance, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.

data.name: Rune of Burning
data.description: Channeled. Deals 1323 Elemental damage over 6 seconds. 100% chance to be setback while casting.

data.name: Rune of Cleansing
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Ailing
data.description: Your rune cleanses an ally, removing one Curse or Ailment.

data.name: Rune of Cleaving
data.description: Deals 524 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Rune of Ending
data.description: Deals 800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and then heals all group members within 100 feet for all damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Fate
data.description: Deals 1162 Elemental damage over 24 seconds and heals your defensive target for the amount of damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Fire
data.description: Deals 234 Elemental damage

data.name: Rune of Fortune
data.description: Deals 310 Elemental damage to your target and heals your Defensive target for the damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Immolation
data.description: Deals 610 Elemental damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Insanity
data.description: Deal 600 damage to target. Lower target's AP by 200.

data.name: Rune of Life
data.description: Resurrect target friendly dead player and restore 20% of their health.

data.name: Rune of Mending
data.description: Restores 267 health, then continues to restore 330 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Rune of Might
data.description: Deals 189 Elemental damage to all targets within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Rune of Nullification
data.description: Critical attacks place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Preservation
data.description: Detaunts targets attack power to 50% for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Rune of Rebirth
data.description: Self Heal for 1200 then an additional 2403 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Regeneration
data.description: Heals for 1755 life over 15 seconds

data.name: Rune of Restoration
data.description:
Restores 919 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will always be set back by a large amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Rune of Serenity
data.description: Heals target for 525 life over 9 seconds, and will then bounce to and heal other allies within 30 feet of the previous target. Effect will not hit the same target more than once, and will heal up to 6 people.

data.name: Rune of Shielding
data.description: Target absorbs up to 550 damage over 10 seconds. When the effect fades, the target recovers 205 health.

data.name: Rune of Skewering
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Rune of Striking
data.description: Deals 277 Elemental damage.

data.name: Rune of Sundering
data.description: Knockbacks targets within 30 feet of you. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Runic Blasting
data.description: Increases crit chance of Rune of Fire, Grungni's Gift, and Rune of Striking by 15%.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Spellbinding Rune
data.description: Silences and wounds target for 375 Elemental damage over 4 seconds.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from Stuns and Knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Increases your Corporeal resistance by 252.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Sundered Motion
data.description: Rune of Sundering's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds and will now apply a 40% movement reduction for 10 seconds to all those hit.

data.name: Swift Runes
data.description: Cooldown on Rune of Cleansing is removed and the cost increased to 40 Action Points.

data.name: Thick-Skulled
data.description: Removes chance to be setback while casting Grungni's Gift, Rune of Mending and Rune of Serenity.

data.name: Valaya's Shield
data.description: Heals your groupmates within 100 feet 1596 health over 15 seconds and gives 375 Action Points over 15 seconds
